column4: Chris_ - there are plenty of tutorials to be found using a quick google search: http://www.google.com/search?q=ubuntu+terminal+tutorial&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=com.ubuntu:en-US:official&client=firefox-a
Austin_-  No, we'd like you to be our new mod. ;-)
zetheroo-  Right click and Open With... Open with other application.  The one you choose should be the new default.
thanks .... btw... thats quite a name you got there...
